name: Pink Onion
author: J M.
description:
Straight to the food: Not good full stop. 

The sauce was very acidic The cheese tasted cheap and had a rubbery mouth feel. 

The worst of all was the crust. It looked and tasted like an old school Pizza Hut pie.  I guess cardboard would be the best way to describe the taste and texture.  With a healthy helping of grease for good measure.  It tasted massed produced I would not be surprised if they got the dough shipped in from an outside vendor. 

Don't get me wrong I'm no snob I'll crush a frozen pizza and I have had my fair share of chain pizza.  However a small pizza for $20 at this "fine Italian cuisine" resturant as they describe it is a grand mis-representation.  I am Sicilian and spent every summer there until I was 18. This is not southern Italian not even close. 

This is drunk food at best.......very very drunk food. 


PS: the meatballs are inedible
